definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: long for (cf. Ar. 9ara/ija ascend, II. bend, incline toward (9ly); 9ariyjun high, elevated; Eth. 9arga: ascend; NH [[עֲרוּגׇה]] = BH);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[תַּעֲרׂג]] Ps 42:2 (of stag, c. [[עַל]] rei in sim.); c. [[אֶל]], of longing for God v:Ps 42:2 (subj. [[נַפְשִׁי]]), so [[תַּעֲרוֹג]] Joe 1:20 (of beasts, craving water).
